title: Corporate Governance Practices of Howmet Aerospace Inc

content.text: Howmet Aerospace Inc has a diverse board composition with a mix of independent directors and company executives. The board consists of 12 members, out of which 10 are independent directors. This indicates a commitment to ensuring effective oversight and minimizing potential conflicts of interest.

The board has an independent chairperson, separate from the CEO role. This separation of power helps to maintain balance and independence in decision-making, allowing for objective oversight of executive actions.

Howmet Aerospace Inc has established multiple board committees to enhance corporate governance. These include the Audit Committee, Compensation and Benefits Committee, Corporate Governance Committee, and Finance Committee. The committees consist of independent directors and provide specialized oversight in key areas of corporate governance and risk management.

The executive compensation structure of Howmet Aerospace Inc is designed to align the interests of executives with the long-term performance of the company. It includes a mix of base salary, annual incentives, and long-term equity-based incentives such as stock options and restricted stock units. Performance metrics tied to financial goals, operational targets, and shareholder returns are used to determine executive bonuses and equity awards.

Howmet Aerospace Inc provides shareholders with the opportunity to vote on executive compensation through an advisory vote known as 'say-on-pay.' This allows shareholders to express their opinion on the fairness and reasonableness of executive pay practices.

The company has implemented various shareholder rights provisions to protect the interests of shareholders. These include proxy access, which allows shareholders to nominate directors, and majority voting in director elections, ensuring directors must receive a majority of votes to be elected or re-elected.

Howmet Aerospace Inc demonstrates a commitment to transparency and disclosure by providing detailed information on corporate governance practices, executive compensation, and board activities in its annual proxy statement. This enables shareholders and stakeholders to make informed decisions and evaluate the company's governance practices.

Overall, Howmet Aerospace Inc exhibits strong corporate governance practices with board independence, diverse committee structures, executive compensation alignment, shareholder rights provisions, and transparent disclosure. These practices contribute to effective oversight, accountability, and protection of shareholder interests.
